headline: Sector Update: Financial Stocks Higher Late Afternoon
summary: Financial stocks advanced in late Wednesday afternoon trading, with the NYSE Financial Index up 0.3%

headline: Sompo Holdings to Buy Aspen Insurance for $3.5 Billion
summary: Apollo Global Management  has struck a deal with Japan’s  Sompo Holdings  to sell  Aspen Insurance  Holdings for about $3.5 billion.  Aspen’s stock was up 13.9% at $36.67 in late morning trading Wednesday.

headline: Apollo Global Management: From Credit And Retirement To Costa Coffee
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. leverages a diversified model for rapid AUM growth, record earnings, and rising dividends. Click for more on APO stock prospects.
